data.approach: Removed task_id lookup from old signal file in user-prompt-signal.sh. User input events now have empty task_id, preventing cross-contamination when starting new tasks.

summary: Identified root cause: user-prompt-signal.sh was reading task_id from the previous signal file
When user ran /jat:start NewAgent new-task, the user_input event inherited the OLD task_id
Fixed by removing the stale task_id lookup - user_input events now have empty task_id
This prevents cross-contamination when switching between tasks/agents in same session

filesModified.description: Removed task_id lookup from old signal file

reviewFocus: Verify the change doesnt break any dashboard features that rely on task_id in user_input events
The EventStack shows user_input events for display only - task_id is not used for filtering
